cds::opt::stat< TYPE > Struct Template Reference

[type-option] Generic option setter for statisitcs More...

#include <cds/opt/stat.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
struct cds::opt::stat< TYPE >

[type-option] Generic option setter for statisitcs

This option sets a type to gather statistics. The option is generic - no predefined type(s) is provided. The particular TYPE of statistics depends on internal structure of the object or class.
